item.title: Demo AI | Minesweeper
item.description: âŒ‚ Rows: Cols: Mines: var r = document.querySelector(':root'); var gameplay = document.querySelector(".game-play") var board = document.querySelector(".board") var gameconsole = document.querySelector(".game-console") var gamestatus = document.querySelector(".game-status") var cell_size var cell_columns = check_number(document.getElementById("new_cols").value, 3, 50) var cell_rows = check_number(document.getElementById("new_rows").value, 3, 50) var mines = check_number(document.getElementById("new_mines").value, 1, 2000) if (mines cell_rows * cell_columns) mines = Math.floor(4 * (cell_rows * cell_columns) / 5); var game = new Minesweeper(cell_rows, cell_columns, mines) var ai = new MinesweeperAI(cell_rows, cell_columns) var i, j var endGame = false var move = null var revealed = new ArraySet() var flags = new ArraySet() var na = document.
